mapper.select: SELECT SP.* , CASE WHEN F.flowNm IS NOT NULL THEN F.flowNm WHEN G.cntntsSj IS NOT NULL THEN G.cntntsSj WHEN D.cntntsSj IS NOT NULL THEN D.cntntsSj END AS NAME , F.imgUrl1 AS FLOWER , SUBSTRING_INDEX(G.rtnStreFileNm, '|', 1) AS INNERPLANT , D.mainImgUrl1 AS DRY, CASE WHEN F.IMGURL1 IS NOT NULL THEN 'A' WHEN G.rtnStreFileNm IS NOT NULL THEN 'B' WHEN D.MAINIMGURL1 IS NOT NULL THEN 'C' END AS TYPE FROM SCRAP_PLANT SP LEFT JOIN FLOWERLIST F ON F.DATANO = SP.NUM LEFT JOIN GARDENDTL G ON G.cntntsNo = SP.NUM LEFT JOIN DRYGARDENDTL D ON D.cntntsNo = SP.NUM WHERE SP.mNO = #{mNO}
